somali: Doorashada garsoorayaasha waxaa loo qorsheeyay kalfadhigii tobnaad ee Golaha Dowladaha Xisbiyada ee Xarunta Qaramada Midoobay laga bilaabo 12-21 Diseembar, 2011.

english: Again, I give examples of  the trials that have taken place so far and how the victims have been  very active subjects in those trials.
somali: Mar labaad, waxaan tusaalooyin u soo qaadanayaa tijaabooyinka ilaa hadda dhacay iyo sida dhibanayaashu ay uga ahaayeen kuwo aad u firfircoon tijaabooyinkaas.

english: One project we are working on for a Kenya-based non-profit will give rural people the chance to access Swahili health information on their cell phones.
somali: Mashruuc aan ka shaqeyneyno oo loogu talagalay hay'ad aan faa'iido doon ahayn oo fadhigeedu yahay Kenya ayaa siin doona dadka reer miyiga ah fursad ay ku helaan macluumaadka caafimaadka ee af-Sawaaxiliga ah taleefannadooda gacanta.

english: Despite writing to election commission and Pakistan Telecommunication Authority (which is responsible for the blocking), party officials have been given no explanation for the block.
somali: In kasta oo ay warqad u qoreen guddiga doorashada iyo Hay'adda Isgaarsiinta Pakistan (oo mas'uul ka ah xannibaadda), mas'uuliyiinta xisbigu ma helin wax sharraxaad ah oo ku saabsan xannibaadda.

english: To avoid infection with the new coronavirus wash your hands several times with soap and water, keep a distance of 1.5 meters from other people.
somali: Si aad uga fogaato caabuqa fayraska cusub ee korona gacmahaaga ku dhaq saabuun iyo biyo dhowr jeer, dadka kale ka joog fogaan dhan 1.5 mitir.

english: Their investigation report was originally published by The Colonist Report, and a shorter version is republished on Global Voices as part of a content-sharing agreement.
somali: Warbixintooda baarista waxaa markii hore daabacay The Colonist Report, nooc gaaban oo ka mid ahna waxaa dib loogu daabacay Global Voices iyada oo qayb ka ah heshiis wadaagga macluumaadka.

english: The US had one of the most devastating forest fire seasons since 1960, with more than 11 million acres burned (that’s the size of Denmark).
somali: Mareykanka wuxuu la kulmay mid ka mid ah xilliyadii ugu xumaa ee dabka kaymaha tan iyo 1960, iyadoo in ka badan 11 milyan oo acres ay gubteen (taasi waa baaxadda Denmark).

english: “Censorship is here to stay, regardless of the tools, so we must stop being obsessed with them and begin to think in the long term.”
somali: "Faafreebku wuu sii jiri doonaa, iyadoon loo eegin qalabka, sidaa darteed waa inaan joojinaa ku mashquulsanaantooda oo aan bilownaa inaan ka fikirno muddada dheer."

english: This year, the absence of two participants from past meetings was especially palpable: Egyptian blogger Alaa Abd El Fattah and Syrian web developer Bassel Safadi.
somali: Sannadkan, maqnaanshaha laba ka qaybgalayaal ah oo ka soo qaybgalay shirarkii hore ayaa si gaar ah loo dareemay: qoraa reer Masar ah Alaa Abd El Fattah iyo horumariyaha webka reer Suuriya Bassel Safadi.

english: While the great majority of the country's over 17 million people are Muslim (97.2 percent), there are also Christians (2.7 percent) and animists (1 percent).
somali: In kasta oo aqlabiyadda dadka dalka oo ka badan 17 milyan ay yihiin Muslimiin (97.2 boqolkiiba), waxaa sidoo kale jira Kiristaan (2.7 boqolkiiba) iyo kuwa caabuda dhirta iyo xayawaanka (1 boqolkiiba).

english: However, Palestinians soon discovered that Egypt was limiting the number of people who could pass through the crossing, and thousands were left waiting in frustration.
somali: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, Falastiiniyiintu waxay dhawaan ogaadeen in Masar ay xaddidayso tirada dadka ka gudbi kara xadka, kumanaan kun oo qofna waxay ku sugnaayeen iyagoo niyad jabsan.

english: Mole-Dagbani languages are a group of languages spoken across West Africa that includes the Dagbani language spoken by approximately three million people in northern Ghana.
somali: Luuqadaha Mole-Dagbani waa koox luuqado ah oo laga hadlo Galbeedka Afrika oo ay ku jirto luuqadda Dagbani oo ay ku hadlaan qiyaastii saddex milyan oo qof oo ku nool waqooyiga Ghana.

english: In response to this question, Global Voices interviewed Réassi Ouabonzi, who also goes by the name Lareus Gangoueus about his engagement with African literary media.
somali: Iyada oo laga jawaabayo su'aashan, Global Voices waxay wareysatay Réassi Ouabonzi, oo sidoo kale loo yaqaan Lareus Gangoueus oo ku saabsan ka qayb qaadashadiisa warbaahinta suugaanta Afrika.

english: But the demonstrators headed straight for the French Embassy to demand the withdrawal of French troops whose failure in the Sahel is no longer debatable.
somali: Laakiin dibadbaxayaashu waxay si toos ah ugu socdeen Safaaradda Faransiiska si ay u dalbadaan in ciidamada Faransiiska laga saaro, kuwaas oo guuldarradooda Sahel aan la isku haysan karin.

english: On this point Russia has demonstrated its effectiveness and it brings no paternalistic context into its links with the African countries, in contrast to France.
somali: Dhinacan, Ruushku wuxuu muujiyay waxtarkiisa mana keenayo macno aabbanimo xiriirkiisa uu la leeyahay wadamada Afrika, taas oo ka duwan Faransiiska.

english: BT: That hypothesis is so perilous for the region and the continent that I hold on to the hope that we won't reach that point.
somali: BT: Mala-awaalkaasi waa mid aad khatar u ah gobolka iyo qaaradda oo dhan, sidaa darteed waxaan rajeynayaa inaan gaari doonin heerkaas.

english: “The stand we defend is that if a journalist has to disclose his sources to a prosecutor, that means that the profession itself has disappeared.
somali: "Mowqifka aan difaaceyno waa haddii wariye uu khasab ku noqoto inuu ilo wareedyada u sheego dacwad oogaha, taasi waxay ka dhigan tahay in xirfadda saxaafadda lafteedu ay meesha ka baxday."

english: A music genre characterized by a blend of Latin American rhythms and African beats, with the guitar and drum playing prominent roles in the instrumentation.
somali: Nooc muusig oo lagu garto isku-darka laxanka Laatiin Ameerika iyo garaaca Afrika, iyadoo gitaarka iyo durbaanku ay door muhiim ah ka ciyaarayaan qalabka muusikada.

english: In recent years, there has been a resurgence of interest in Rhumba, especially among a younger generation in Africa but particularly so in East Africa.
somali: Sanadihii ugu dambeeyay, waxaa jiray dib u soo noolaansho xiisaha Rhumba, gaar ahaan dhalinyarada Afrika, laakiin si gaar ah Bariga Afrika.

english: There has been abundant public discourse on false information in news channels, particularly in international languages like French and English, and in major African languages.
somali: Waxaa jiray wadahadal badan oo dadweyne oo ku saabsan macluumaadka beenta ah ee ku jira kanaalada wararka, gaar ahaan luqadaha caalamiga ah sida Faransiiska iyo Ingiriisiga, iyo luqadaha waaweyn ee Afrika.

english: Many projects are translated via online platforms that have an integrated translation memory, but you can also get free offline tools like Virtaal or Poedit.
somali: Mashruucyo badan ayaa lagu turjumaa barnaamijyo internetka ah oo leh xusuusta tarjumaadda oo isku dhafan, laakiin waxaad sidoo kale heli kartaa qalab bilaash ah oo offline ah sida Virtaal ama Poedit.

english: “If you need to join us in Ngakoro by telephone, be patient, insist on the call because we don't haven our telephones with us everywhere.
somali: "Haddii aad u baahan tahay inaad taleefan nagula soo xiriirto Ngakoro, samir yeelo, ku adkeyso wicitaanka sababtoo ah taleefannada nooma wataan meel walba."

english: OM: Words, numbers, symbols and signs are some of the major elements that you draw and visualize in an aesthetically beautiful and sophisticated harmonic way.
somali: OM: Erayada, tirooyinka, calaamadaha iyo astaamaha ayaa ka mid ah qaybaha ugu muhiimsan ee aad sawirto oo aad ku muujiso si qurux badan oo farshaxanimo leh.

english: William came to limelight about three years ago when a Daily Times reporter followed his story in Kasungu  about 150 kilometers north of Malawi's capital.
somali: William wuxuu caan noqday qiyaastii saddex sano ka hor markii weriye ka tirsan Daily Times uu ka daba galay sheekadiisa Kasungu oo qiyaastii 150 kiiloomitir waqooyi ka xigta caasimadda Malawi.

english: This will be his first historic visit to Sub-Saharan Africa and will use tools such as Twitter, Facebook and SMS to speak directly to Africans.
somali: Tani waxay noqon doontaa booqashadiisii taariikhiga ahayd ee ugu horreysay ee uu ku tago Afrika Saxaraha ka hooseeya, waxa uuna adeegsan doonaa qalabka sida Twitter-ka, Facebook iyo SMS si uu si toos ah ugula hadlo Afrikaanka.

english: After the speech, a taped audio recording of the President’s answers to the SMS messages received will be made available to radio stations and websites.
somali: Ka dib khudbadda, cajal maqal ah oo duuban oo ah jawaabaha Madaxweynaha ee fariimaha SMS-ka la helay ayaa laga heli doonaa idaacadaha iyo mareegaha.

english: The National Independent Human Rights Commission also praised the pardon, calling for more alternative sentences, such as community work, and to avoid excessive pretrial detention.
somali: Guddiga Qaranka ee Xuquuqda Aadanaha ee Madaxbannaan ayaa sidoo kale bogaadiyay cafiska, isagoo ugu baaqay in la helo xukunno kale oo beddel u ah, sida shaqada bulshada, iyo in laga fogaado xabsiga ka hor maxkamadeynta oo xad dhaaf ah.

english: Data gathered by Iwacu newspaper showed a steady increase in the country's already overcrowded prison population from 2014 to 2018, while capacity stayed the same.
somali: Xog ay ururisay jariiradda Iwacu ayaa muujisay in tirada maxaabiista xabsiyada dalka oo markii horeba buux dhaafay ay si joogto ah u kordhaysay intii u dhaxaysay 2014 ilaa 2018, halka awoodda qaadashada xabsiyadu ay isku mid ahayd.

english: Improving prison conditions and leniency could be useful for officials to present a positive, peaceful image in a wider diplomatic push, after years of tensions.
somali: Horumarinta xaaladaha xabsiyada iyo naxariista ayaa u noqon karta mid waxtar u leh mas'uuliyiinta si ay u muujiyaan muuqaal wanaagsan oo nabdoon oo ku aaddan dadaal diblomaasiyadeed oo ballaaran, ka dib sannado badan oo xiisado ah.

english: Companies looking to set up helplines for a rural customer base at a reduced cost are potential customers for the initial phase of Uliza’s growth.
somali: Shirkadaha doonaya inay sameeyaan khadadka caawinta macaamiisha miyiga ah qiimo jaban ayaa ah macaamiisha suurtagalka ah ee wejiga hore ee kobaca Uliza.

english: Although this press code doesn’t include social networks in its definition of media outlets, it does provide procedures to follow for journalists using such networks.
somali: In kasta oo xeerkan saxaafaddu uusan ku darin shabakadaha bulshada qeexitaankeeda warbaahinta, haddana wuxuu bixiyaa habraacyo ay raacaan suxufiyiinta isticmaala shabakadahaas.

english: However I would advise the first time applicants to really look into the technical part, as it can play a big role in the project.
somali: Si kastaba ha ahaatee waxaan kula talin lahaa codsadayaasha markii ugu horeysay inay si dhab ah u eegaan qaybta farsamada, maadaama ay door weyn ka ciyaari karto mashruuca.

english: According to Edward, the site “is the perfect place for you to recycle or sell used cell phones, mp3 players, digital cameras and graphing calculators.
somali: Sida laga soo xigtay Edward, goobta "waa meesha ugu fiican ee aad ku daadi karto ama ku iibin karto taleefannada gacanta ee la isticmaalay, aaladaha MP3, kamaradaha dijitaalka ah iyo xisaabiyeyaasha garaafka."

english: With the Arab Spring, the Algerian government has become conscious of the importance of the Internet as a free medium and of the potential risks.
somali: Iyadoo Kacdoonkii Carabta, dowladda Aljeeriya waxay ogaatay muhiimadda internetka oo ah warbaahin xor ah iyo khataraha iman kara.

english: The technology sector in West Africa stands to benefit from Glo-1 as companies will be able to communicate more easily with clients and partners overseas.
somali: Qaybta tiknoolajiyadda ee Galbeedka Afrika waxay ka faa'iideysan doontaa Glo-1 maadaama shirkaduhu ay si fudud ula xiriiri karaan macaamiisha iyo la-hawlgalayaasha dibadda.

english: Help us to share Nelson Mandela’s vision of a better future for all, take action this weekend, and tell us about it on our Facebook Page.
somali: Nala ka qayb qaado sidii aan u gaarsiin lahayn aragtida Nelson Mandela ee mustaqbal wanaagsan oo dhammaanteen ah, tallaabo qaado dhammaadka toddobaadkan, oo nooga sheeg boggayaga Facebook.

english: Two days of riots broke out on April 6 and 7 in Egypt, where  prices of staples have doubled since 2004 (and in some cases quadrupled).
somali: Laba maalmood oo rabshado ah ayaa ka dhacay Masar 6-dii iyo 7-dii Abriil, halkaas oo qiimaha raashinka daruuriga ah uu laba jibaarmay tan iyo 2004 (qaar kalena afar jibaar).

english: The plan is to leverage the widespread use of mobile phones in developing countries – 64 percent of cell phone users are in the developing world.
somali: Qorshuhu waa in la isticmaalo isticmaalka ballaaran ee taleefannada gacanta ee wadamada soo koraya - 64 boqolkiiba dadka isticmaala taleefannada gacanta waxay ku nool yihiin wadamada soo koraya.

english: The report highlights projects such as Project Masiluleke (or Project M) in South Africa, a SMS-based service that promotes an AIDS hotline and provides HIV/AIDS education.
somali: Warbixintu waxay iftiiminaysaa mashaariic sida Mashruuca Masiluleke (ama Mashruuca M) ee Koonfur Afrika, oo ah adeeg ku salaysan SMS oo kor u qaada khadka taleefanka ee AIDS-ka isla markaana bixiya waxbarashada HIV/AIDS.

english: Traditionally, these commodities were procured in “mandis” (major agricultural marketing centers in rural areas of India), where the middleman used to make most of the profit.
somali: Dhaqan ahaan, badeecadahan waxaa laga soo iibsan jiray "mandis" (xarumaha waaweyn ee suuqgeynta beeraha ee miyiga Hindiya), halkaas oo dhexdhexaadiyaha uu ka heli jiray faa'iidada ugu badan.

english: During the 2008 Ghana Presidential elections, many Ghanaians took to social media sites such as Twitter and Facebook to share concerns and opinions about the process.
somali: Intii lagu jiray doorashadii Madaxweynaha Ghana ee 2008, dad badan oo reer Ghana ah ayaa adeegsaday baraha bulshada sida Twitter iyo Facebook si ay u wadaagaan walaacyadooda iyo fikradahooda ku saabsan geeddi-socodka.

english: We found Oktavia Sidharta through Portnoy of Global Voices in Chinese, while our latest addition, Juliana Harsianti, is also an acquaintance of mine back in Jakarta.
somali: Waxaan Oktavia Sidharta ka helnay Portnoy oo ka tirsan Global Voices oo ku qoran Shiine, halka qofkii ugu dambeeyay ee aan ku darnay, Juliana Harsianti, ay sidoo kale tahay qof aan is naqaan oo aan ku lahaa Jakarta.

english: I don’t actually understand when courts should grant suspended sentences but, as a radio man, I am here to appreciate that this boy is a genius.”
somali: Runtii ma fahmin goorta ay tahay in maxkamadaha ay xukuno hakad ku jiraan bixiyaan laakiin, anigoo ah nin raadiyaha ka shaqeeya, waxaan halkaan u joogaa inaan qiro in wiilkan uu yahay qof caqli badan.

english: According to the project blog the meeting was organized according to the format of a Barcamp and was rightly dubbed as the second Barcamp of Madagascar.
somali: Sida laga soo xigtay baloogga mashruuca, kulanka waxaa loo qabanqaabiyay qaabka Barcamp, waxaana si sax ah loogu magac daray Barcamp-kii labaad ee Madagascar.

english: An agreement that if implemented with good faith, will deliver a peaceful way forward toward a stable economy, a new constitution and free and fair elections.
somali: Heshiis haddii lagu fuliyo niyad sami, uu horseedi doono waddo nabdoon oo loo maro dhaqaale xasilloon, dastuur cusub iyo doorasho xor iyo xalaal ah.

english: Spanish journalist Hernán Zin met Namujimbo in his office when he traveled to Bukavu last summer to report on sexual violence as a weapon of war.
somali: Suxufiga reer Spain Hernán Zin wuxuu la kulmay Namujimbo xafiiskiisa markii uu u safray Bukavu xagaagii hore si uu warbixin uga diyaariyo rabshadaha galmada oo ah hub dagaal.

english: On January 12th, Yar'Adua gave an interview confirming that he was alive and receiving treatment, though he gave no indication when he would return to Nigeria.
somali: Bishii Janaayo 12-keedii, Yar'Adua wuxuu bixiyay wareysi uu ku xaqiijinayo inuu nool yahay oo uu daaweyn helayo, in kastoo uusan sheegin goorta uu ku laaban doono Nayjeeriya.

english: GV: So how does architecture host that relationship between people and environment in a world where technology is such an influence and is changing so fast?
somali: GV: Haddaba sidee bay dhismaha u martigelinaysaa xiriirka ka dhexeeya dadka iyo deegaanka adduunka oo tiknoolajiyadu saamayn weyn ku leedahay oo si degdeg ah isu beddelayo?

english: For instance, high levels of inflation, would have meant returning to higher value denominations within a short space of time, as was the case in Zimbabwe.
somali: Tusaale ahaan, heerarka sicir-bararka oo sarreeya, waxay la macno tahay in lagu laabanayo lacago qiimo sare leh muddo gaaban gudaheed, sida ay dhacday Zimbabwe.

english: Despite a booming African economy with a growth rate of 3.8 percent, the economic situation in Madagascar, also known as the Great Island, continues to deteriorate.
somali: In kasta oo dhaqaalaha Afrika uu si xawli ah u korayo, heerka kobaca uu yahay 3.8 boqolkiiba, xaaladda dhaqaale ee Madagascar, oo sidoo kale loo yaqaan Jasiiradda Weyn, ayaa sii xumaanaysa.

english: Shortly after information from the hack became public, several security experts and journalists started posting Hacking Team's lengthy client list, internal communications records, and some invoices.
somali: Wax yar ka dib markii macluumaadka la jabsaday uu soo shaac baxay, dhowr khabiir oo amniga ah iyo saxafiyiin ayaa bilaabay inay soo dhigaan liiska macaamiisha shirkadda Hacking Team, diiwaanka isgaarsiinta gudaha, iyo qaar ka mid ah biilasha.

english: Since then, the results of various studies would seem to confirm these positive results, giving way to new approaches in the fight against the AIDS epidemic.
somali: Tan iyo markaas, natiijooyinka daraasado kala duwan waxay u muuqdaan inay xaqiijinayaan natiijooyinkan wanaagsan, iyagoo u gogol xaaraya habab cusub oo looga hortago faafitaanka cudurka AIDS.

english: By visiting the places where our patients live we can better understand the difficulties, the problems, and together we can work out ways to overcome them.
somali: Marka aan booqano goobaha ay bukaannadayadu ku nool yihiin waxaan si fiican u fahmi karnaa dhibaatooyinka, caqabadaha, oo wadajir ayaan uga shaqeyn karnaa sidii looga gudbi lahaa.

english: Her radio broadcast reaches many ears that day, as many locals only speak Wolof and may only get their news from an oral medium like radio.
somali: Barnaamijkeedii raadiyaha ayaa gaaray dhego badan maalintaas, maadaama dad badan oo deegaanka ah ay ku hadlaan af Wolof oo kaliya waxayna wararkooda ka heli karaan oo keliya warbaahinta afka ah sida raadiyaha.

english: As the director of the AWJP, Catherine Gicheru explains that gender-based violence and maternal-fetal health issues are significant topics that affect women in every African nation.
somali: Agaasimaha AWJP, Catherine Gicheru, waxay sharraxaysaa in rabshadaha ku salaysan jinsiga iyo arrimaha caafimaadka hooyada iyo uurjiifka ay yihiin mowduucyo muhiim ah oo saameeya haweenka ku nool dal kasta oo Afrika ah.

english: Combining each journalist's local knowledge of women's issues — such as gender violence in Senegal compared to Nigeria — can help enrich and strengthen collaborative storytelling.
somali: Isku-darka aqoonta maxalliga ah ee wariye kastaa u leeyahay arrimaha haweenka - sida rabshadaha jinsiga ee Senegal marka loo eego Nayjeeriya - waxay gacan ka geysan kartaa kobcinta iyo xoojinta sheeko-wadaagga wada-shaqayneed.

english: With the survey results on the barriers facing women journalists in these three francophone countries, Gicheru hopes to land more funding to launch the journalism fellowship.
somali: Iyada oo natiijooyinka sahanka ku saabsan caqabadaha haysta saxafiyiinta haweenka ah ee saddexdan waddan ee ku hadla afka Faransiiska, Gicheru waxay rajeyneysaa inay hesho maalgelin dheeraad ah si ay u bilowdo deeqda waxbarasho ee saxaafadda.

english: Algerian blogger Merzoug Touati was sentenced to ten years in prison in late May for reporting online about austerity strikes, job protests, and human rights violations.
somali: Qoraa Blog ah oo u dhashay Aljeeriya Merzoug Touati ayaa lagu xukumay toban sano oo xabsi ah dhammaadkii bishii Maajo ka dib markii uu online ka soo sheegay shaqo joojin dhaqaale xumo awgeed, dibadbaxyo shaqo la'aan ah, iyo xadgudubyo xuquuqda aadanaha.

english: A man from Kerala, India was arrested by police after writing a Facebook post about a damaged road, calling on a local politician to repair it.
somali: Nin u dhashay Kerala, Hindiya ayaa waxaa xidhay booliiska ka dib markii uu qoray qoraal Facebook ah oo ku saabsan waddo burbursan, isagoo ugu baaqay siyaasi deegaanka ah inuu hagaajiyo.

english: The  Portuguese language, spoken by more than 200 million people around the world, has often been described as the “fatherland” or “motherland” of the Portuguese-speaking world.
somali: Luqadda Boortaqiiska, oo ay ku hadlaan in ka badan 200 milyan oo qof oo adduunka ah, ayaa badanaa lagu tilmaamaa "dhulka aabbaha" ama "dhulka hooyada" ee dunida ku hadasha Boortaqiiska.

english: Though climate change is a global phenomenon, experts warn that its health consequences will be the most severe for the poorest people in the poorest countries.
somali: In kasta oo isbeddelka cimiladu uu yahay dhacdo caalami ah, khubaradu waxay ka digayaan in cawaaqib xumada caafimaad ee ugu daran ay la kulmi doonaan dadka ugu saboolsan ee ku nool waddamada ugu saboolsan.

english: As a community, we have a responsibility to stand in solidarity with activists promoting freedom and exposing human rights violations in service of our shared humanity.
somali: Bulsho ahaan, waxaa naga saaran mas'uuliyad ah inaan garab istaagno dadka u dhaqdhaqaaqa xuquuqda aadanaha ee kor u qaadaya xoriyadda iyo soo bandhigaya xadgudubyada xuquuqda aadanaha si loogu adeego aadannimadeenna wadajirka ah.

english: In early 2021, over 4,000 Dagbani words were recorded and uploaded to Wikimedia Commons as part of a campaign to raise the visibility of the language.
somali: Horraantii 2021, in ka badan 4,000 oo erey oo Af-Dagbani ah ayaa la duubay laguna soo geliyay Wikimedia Commons iyadoo qayb ka ah olole lagu kordhinayo muuqaalka luqadda.

english: In recent days, it had been rumored that the government of President Condé would soon introduce the instruction of national languages into our country's educational system.
somali: Maalmihii u dambeeyay, waxaa jiray hadal hayn ah in dowladda Madaxweyne Condé ay dhawaan soo bandhigi doonto barashada luqadaha qaranka ee nidaamka waxbarashada dalkeenna.

english: The Nigerien people will show resilience and will get through this because freedom and the ascerting of souvereignty have a price they have decided to pay.
somali: Dadka reer Niger waxay muujin doonaan adkaysi waxayna ka gudbi doonaan tan sababtoo ah xorriyadda iyo xaqiijinta madax-bannaanida waxay leeyihiin qiimo ay go'aansadeen inay bixiyaan.

english: He was subsequently charged with “spreading false information by electronic means” at the Criminal Chamber of Benin’s Court of Repression of Economic Offenses and Terrorism CRIET).
somali: Waxaa markii dambe lagu soo oogay dacwad ah "faafinta warar been abuur ah oo loo marayo qaabab elektaroonik ah" oo ka dhacday Maxkamadda Dembiyada Dhaqaalaha iyo Argagixisada ee Benin (CRIET).

english: This modernised Rhumba which is retaining its traditional style while embracing new sounds has grown in appeal to both old and new fans of the genre.
somali: Rhumba-kan casriga ah oo ilaalinaya qaabkiisii ​​dhaqameed isla markaana qaadanaya codad cusub ayaa soo jiidasho u yeelatay taageerayaashii hore iyo kuwa cusub ee noocaas ah.

english: The emergence of a new generation of Rhumba artists who are infusing fresh styles into the Rhumba sound is making it more appealing to younger audiences.
somali: Soo ifbaxa jiil cusub oo fannaaniinta Rhumba ah oo ku soo kordhinaya qaabab cusub codka Rhumba ayaa ka dhigaya mid aad u soo jiidasho badan dhagaystayaasha da'da yar.

english: Coleman Donaldson, a linguistic anthropologist at the University of Hamburg is the founder of An ka taa (“let’s go”) an online project that teaches Bambara language.
somali: Coleman Donaldson, oo ah aqoonyahan luqadeed ka tirsan Jaamacadda Hamburg, waa aasaasaha An ka taa ("aan tagno") oo ah mashruuc online ah oo bara luqadda Bambara.

english: So, it is really important to keep it a friendly and fun environment for everybody (not saying that work places shouldn’t be fun and friendly too…).
somali: Marka, aad ayey muhiim u tahay in jawi saaxiibtinimo iyo farxad leh loo abuuro qof walba (taas macnaheedu maaha in goobaha shaqadu aysan noqon karin kuwo farxad iyo saaxiibtinimo leh...).

english: In November, on 11/11/11 we invite world citizens to help create a collaborative portrait of humanity with: photos, films, audio, and blog posts about this day.
somali: Bishii Nofeembar, 11/11/11, waxaan ku casuumeynaa muwaadiniinta adduunka inay naga caawiyaan abuurista sawir wadajir ah oo bini'aadanimo ah oo leh: sawirro, filimaan, codad, iyo qoraallo blog ah oo ku saabsan maalintan.

english: “We cannot sit still and work in a bubble without thinking about our environment and what surrounds us,” said Koraichi in an interview with Global Voices.
somali: "Ma fariisan karno oo ku shaqeyn karno meel cidlo ah annaga oo aan ka fikirin deegaankeena iyo waxa nagu wareegsan," ayuu Koraichi ku yiri wareysi uu siiyay Global Voices.

english: So before you applaud Morocco for building the largest solar park in the world, think about how it’s impacting local communities already experiencing a water crisis.
somali: Markaa ka hor inta aadan u sacabin Morocco dhismaha beerta qoraxda ugu weyn adduunka, ka fikir sida ay u saameynayso bulshooyinka deegaanka ee durbaba la kulmaya dhibaatada biyaha.

english: Malanje was “rewarded” with a luxury hotel, but other provinces will have the same privilege, with the construction of resorts, residential hotels and other similar investments.
somali: Malanje waxaa "la guddoonsiiyay" hudheel raaxo leh, laakiin gobolada kale waxay yeelan doonaan mudnaan la mid ah, iyadoo la dhisayo goobo dalxiis, hoteello degenaansho iyo maalgashiyo kale oo la mid ah.

english: US President Barack Obama has received thousands of text messages about Africa after he asked people to send questions before his trip to Ghana on Friday.
somali: Madaxweynaha Mareykanka Barack Obama ayaa helay kumanaan farriimo qoraaleed oo ku saabsan Afrika ka dib markii uu dadka weydiistay inay soo diraan su'aalo ka hor safarkiisa uu ku tagayo Ghana Jimcaha.

english: Students had to go back to their hometown for the summer holidays: we used this time to collect data and stories from these far away places.
somali: Ardaydu waxay ku qasbanaadeen inay ku laabtaan magaalooyinkoodii fasaxa xagaaga: waxaan waqtigan u isticmaalnay inaan xog iyo sheekooyin ka soo ururinno meelahaas fog fog.

english: The Cup of Nations, the most important international football competition in Africa, is taking place in Gabon and Equatorial Guinea between January 21 and 12 February.
somali: Koobka Qaramada, oo ah tartanka kubadda cagta ee ugu muhiimsan Afrika, ayaa ka dhacaya Gabon iyo Equatorial Guinea inta u dhaxaysa 21 Janaayo iyo 12 Febraayo.

english: It is a punishment which fits over the press law rather than criminal matters where we had boarded the prosecutor, provoking disgust and shocking the world.
somali: Waa ciqaab ku habboon sharciga saxaafadda halkii ay ka ahaan lahayd arrimaha dambiyada oo aan ku soo xidhnay xeer ilaaliyaha, taasoo kicisay karaahiyo iyo naxdin adduunka.

english: Beyond the three journalists from The New Courier, the two other defendants in the entourage of attorney (his secretary and his communications advisor) have been released.
somali: Marka laga reebo saddexda wariye ee ka socda The New Courier, labadii eedaysane ee kale ee la socday qareenka (xoghayihiisa iyo la taliyihiisa dhanka isgaarsiinta) ayaa la sii daayay.

english: Organizers intended for the chain to reach the home of President Enrique Pena Nieto, the bill’s chief proponent, but police forced protesters to alter its trajectory.
somali: Qabanqaabiyayaashu waxay doonayeen in silsiladdu ay gaarto guriga Madaxweyne Enrique Pena Nieto, oo ah hormuudka hindise-sharciyeedka, laakiin booliisku waxay ku qasbeen dibadbaxayaasha inay beddelaan jihaynteeda.

english: Others gather in transit sites on the outskirts of the flooded area, waiting to be resettled in a location yet to be determined by the authorities.
somali: Kuwo kalena waxay ku ururaan goobaha marinka ee duleedka aagga daadadku ka dhacay, iyagoo sugaya in dib loogu dejiyo goob ay weli go'aaminayaan mas'uuliyiinta.

english: Scientists insist that climate change played a major role in creating this cyclone and the widespread flooding witnessed over the last few weeks in southern Africa.
somali: Saynisyahannadu waxay ku adkeysanayaan in isbeddelka cimiladu uu door weyn ka qaatay abuurista duufaantan iyo daadadka baahsan ee ka dhacay toddobaadyadii la soo dhaafay koonfurta Afrika.

english: For a few thousand dollars, “a company, a brand of beer, a politicians, or an officer in the army” can see his name placed in a song.
somali: Qarash dhowr kun oo dollar ah, "shirkad, nooc biir ah, siyaasiyiin, ama sarkaal ka tirsan ciidanka" wuxuu arki karaa magaciisa oo lagu dhejiyay hees.

english: Difference in price for good quality and inferior quality was less, and hence there was no incentive for the farmers to invest and produce good quality output.
somali: Farqiga qiimaha ee tayada wanaagsan iyo tayada liidata ayaa yaraa, sidaas darteedna ma jirin wax dhiirigelin ah oo beeralayda ku dhiirrigelinaya inay maalgashadaan oo ay soo saaraan wax soo saar tayo leh.

english: There was no bitterness or accusation, just statements of events lived personally and stories of everyday courage because that was and is the right thing to do.
somali: Ma jirin qadhaadh ama eedayn, kaliya sheekooyin dhacdooyin shaqsi ah iyo sheekooyin geesinimo maalinle ah sababtoo ah taasi waxay ahayd oo ay tahay waxa saxda ah ee la sameeyo.

english: The two stars have also joined forces in the past  in producing a rap single against racism and are often seen celebrating together with humorous dance moves.
somali: Labada xiddig ayaa sidoo kale horey isaga kaashaday soo saarista hees rap ah oo ka dhan ah cunsuriyadda waxaana badanaa la arkaa iyagoo si wadajir ah u dabaaldegaya iyagoo sameynaya dhaqdhaqaaqyo qoob ka ciyaar oo qosol leh.

english: Citoyen Hmida, for example, is run by a retired bank employee; and Adamito by a young college student (high school student at the time he started it).
somali: Tusaale ahaan, Citoyen Hmida waxaa maamula shaqaale bangi oo hawlgab ah; Adamitona waxaa maamula arday jaamacadeed oo da'yar (wuxuu ahaa arday dugsi sare markii uu bilaabay).

english: Indeed, some blogs are capitalizing on the lack of Moroccan Arabic-speaking blogs and have declared that their purpose is to promote the use of Arabic while blogging.
somali: Runtii, baloogyo qaar ayaa ka faa'iideysanaya la'aanta baloogyada ku hadla Carabiga Moroccan waxayna ku dhawaaqeen in ujeedkoodu yahay in lagu dhiirrigeliyo isticmaalka Carabiga inta lagu jiro baloogaynta.

english: Its real usefulness is ultimately something that can only be realized if the users utilize such technology skillfully towards a good goal,” he writes in an e-mail.
somali: "Waxtarkeeda dhabta ah ugu dambeyn waa wax la fahmi karo oo keliya haddii dadka isticmaala ay si xirfadaysan u adeegsadaan tiknoolajiyadaas si loo gaaro hadaf wanaagsan," ayuu ku qoray email.

english: The report will make recommendations to funders, activists, NGOs, and government officials regarding the current obstacles to effectively applying technology to improve transparency, accountability, and civic engagement.
somali: Warbixintu waxay soo jeedin doontaa talooyin loogu talagalay maalgeliyayaasha, dhaqdhaqaaqayaasha, hay'adaha aan dawliga ahayn, iyo mas'uuliyiinta dawladda oo ku saabsan caqabadaha jira ee hortaagan in si wax ku ool ah loogu dabaqo tignoolajiyada horumarinta hufnaanta, isla xisaabtanka, iyo ka qaybgalka muwaadiniinta.

english: The draft suggests that the Commission will not propose new regulations, but rather envisions private companies like Facebook and Google taking greater responsibility for these issues voluntarily.
somali: Qabyo-qoraalka waxa uu soo jeedinayaa in Guddigu aanu soo jeedin doonin xeerar cusub, balse uu qiyaasayo in shirkadaha gaarka loo leeyahay sida Facebook iyo Google ay si iskood ah mas'uuliyad weyn uga qaataan arrimahan.

english: The Born Free Foundation has said that these lions have to have been decorated by end of August in readiness for a parade in Nairobi this November.
somali: Hay'adda Born Free Foundation waxay sheegtay in libaaxyadan ay tahay in la qurxiyo dhammaadka bisha Agoosto si loogu diyaariyo dhoolatus ka dhici doona Nairobi bisha Nofembar ee soo socota.

english: A few months ago, the think-tank Terangaweb, an independent body marketing itself as the “Africa of Ideas”, published a ranking of 30 young African entrepreneurs to follow.
somali: Bilo ka hor, hay'adda fikirka Terangaweb, oo ah hay'ad madax-bannaan oo isu suuq geysa "Afrika Fikradaha", ayaa daabacday qiimeyn 30 ganacsato da'yar ah oo Afrikaan ah oo la raaco.

english: The term first came into use in mainland China, where online communities began to refer to themselves as wǎngmín (网民, literally “net-citizen”) and wǎngyǒu (网友, literally “net-friend”).
somali: Ereygan markii ugu horreysay waxaa la isticmaalay dhul-weynaha Shiinaha, halkaas oo bulshooyinka internetka ay bilaabeen inay isugu yeeraan wǎngmín (网民, oo macneheedu yahay "muwaadin shabakad") iyo wǎngyǒu (网友, oo macneheedu yahay "saaxiib shabakad").

english: As a community of writers and activists, we’ve faced censorship, harassment and direct threats because of our activism on Facebook since the early days of the platform.
somali: Annagoo ah bulsho qorayaal iyo dhaqdhaqaaqayaal ah, waxaan la kulanay faafreeb, caga juglayn iyo hanjabaado toos ah sababo la xiriira dhaqdhaqaaqayaga Facebook tan iyo bilowgii goobta.

english: In other words we inform people in the countries where we haves bases about HIV, about its prevention and treatment and about the rights of HIV-positive people.
somali: Si kale haddii loo dhigo, waxaan dadka ku nool wadamada aan saldhigyada ku leenahay ka wacyigelineynaa HIV, ka hortagga iyo daaweynta, iyo xuquuqda dadka qaba HIV.

english: “Many of our elders are passing away, each day, and it's really important to keep what we have now,” said Sarah Johnson, the Board's native language lead.
somali: "Odayaasheena badan ayaa maalin walba geeriyoonaya, waana muhiim inaan ilaalino waxa aan hadda haysanno," ayay tiri Sarah Johnson, oo ah madaxa luqadda hooyo ee Guddiga.

english: This was the first time that an injunction has been issued based on a 2017 resolution intended to regulate the spread of disinformation during the 2018 elections.
somali: Tani waxay ahayd markii ugu horreysay oo amar maxkamadeed lagu soo saaro qaraar la meel mariyay 2017 oo loogu talagalay in lagu xakameeyo faafinta wararka been abuurka ah intii lagu jiray doorashooyinkii 2018.

english: The law would allow candidates to complain about the dissemination of false information about them online and judges will have 48 hours to decide on a case.
somali: Sharcigan wuxuu u oggolaanayaa musharaxiinta inay ka cawdaan faafinta macluumaadka been abuurka ah ee laga sheego internetka, garsoorayaashuna waxay yeelan doonaan 48 saacadood si ay go'aan uga gaaraan kiiska.

english: Moahi told us that her granddaughter developed rashes and difficulty breathing and was suffering from stomach pain when she decided to rush her to a local clinic.
somali: Moahi waxay noo sheegtay in markii ay go'aansatay inay ula cararto gabadheeda xarun caafimaad oo ku dhow, ay gabadheeda ka soo baxeen finan, ay ku adkaatay neefsashada, iyo inay calool xanuun ka cabanaysay.

english: Additionally, he noted that a bioremediation plant, which will significantly reduce the nitrate levels in the water leaching from the active waste rock dump, was recently completed.
somali: Intaa waxaa dheer, wuxuu xusay in dhowaan la dhameystiray warshad daaweyn bayooloji ah, taas oo si weyn hoos ugu dhigi doonta heerarka nitrate ee biyaha ka soo daadanaya qashinka dhagaxa firfircoon.

english: Within 72 hours, a third of the documents from 36 rue Botzaris disappeared, the police evacuated the building and the (Tunisian) ambassador reclaimed possession of the building.
somali: Muddo 72 saacadood gudahood, saddex meelood meel dukumeentiyadii laga helay 36 rue Botzaris way baaba'een, booliisku waxay ka daadgureeyeen dadkii dhismaha, safiirka (Tuuniisiya)na wuxuu dib ula wareegay lahaanshaha dhismaha.

english: It is believed there have been about 40 cases of ebola, with over 10 deaths reported in the Democratic Republic of Congo in the last two months.
somali: Waxaa la aaminsan yahay inay jireen ilaa 40 kiis oo Ebola ah, iyadoo in ka badan 10 dhimasho laga soo sheegay Jamhuuriyadda Dimuqraadiga ah ee Congo labadii bilood ee la soo dhaafay.

english: Now Wikipedia editors using a desktop or laptop computer can incorporate the special characters into their texts by typing the tilde (~) character before the corresponding letter.
somali: Hadda tifaftireyaasha Wikipedia ee isticmaalaya kombuyuutar desktop ama laptop waxay ku dari karaan jilayaasha gaarka ah qoraalladooda iyagoo ku qoraya calaamadda tilde (~) ka hor xarafka u dhigma.

english: (AOY): What do you think are the biggest challenges facing your language community when it comes to digital communications or creating digital content in their mother language?
somali: (AOY): Maxay kula tahay caqabadaha ugu waaweyn ee bulshadaada ku hadasha afkaaga ay la kulmaan marka ay timaado isgaarsiinta dijitaalka ah ama abuurista macluumaadka dijitaalka ah ee ku qoran afkooda hooyo?

english: India and Bangladesh will jointly observe International Mother Language Day in the no-man's-land along their borders, in an initiative to encourage individual relations between the two nations.
somali: Hindiya iyo Bangladesh ayaa si wadajir ah u xusi doona Maalinta Caalamiga ah ee Luqadda Hooyo ee dhulka aan cidna lahayn ee ku teedsan xuduudahooda, iyadoo loogu talagalay in lagu dhiirrigeliyo xiriirka shaqsiyadeed ee labada dal.

english: The editorial director of the “Le Nouveau Courrier” is willing to go back over this imprisonment which hides some unspoken intentions on the part of Prosecutor Tchimou.
somali: Agaasimaha tifaftirka ee "Le Nouveau Courrier" wuxuu diyaar u yahay inuu dib u eego xariggan oo qarinaya ujeedooyin aan la sheegin oo uu leeyahay Xeer Ilaaliyaha Tchimou.

english: Contemporary musicians from Kenya, Tanzania &  Democratic Republic of Congo are blending the traditional Rhumba sound with modern music styles, making it more appealing to younger audiences.
somali: Fanaaniinta casriga ah ee ka soo jeeda Kenya, Tanzania iyo Jamhuuriyadda Dimuqraadiga ah ee Congo ayaa isku daraya muusikada Rhumba dhaqameedka iyo qaababka muusikada casriga ah, taasoo ka dhigaysa mid aad u soo jiidata dhagaystayaasha da'da yar.

english: Calls to come to the rescue of refugees in Ras Jdir have been spreading via social media, and campaigns to collect humanitarian aid have also been organised.
somali: Baaqyo lagu badbaadinayo qaxootiga ku sugan Ras Jdir ayaa lagu faafinayay baraha bulshada, waxaana sidoo kale la abaabulay ololeyaal lagu ururinayo gargaar bani'aadannimo.

english: With a population of 11 million people, the Mandingo ethnic group cuts across the West African countries of Guinea, Cote d'Ivoire, Mali, Senegal, the Gambia and Guinea-Bissau.
somali: Iyada oo ay tiradoodu gaadhayso 11 milyan oo qof, qowmiyadda Mandinka waxay ku baahsan tahay wadamada Galbeedka Afrika ee Guinea, Cote d'Ivoire, Mali, Senegal, Gambia iyo Guinea-Bissau.

english: This is because mis- and disinformation has a great public impact on people's lives; the inability to distinguish facts from fallacy is the challenge of our times.
somali: Tani waa sababta oo ah wararka been abuurka ah iyo kuwa marin habaabinta ahi ay saameyn weyn ku leeyihiin nolosha dadweynaha; awood la'aanta lagu kala saaro xaqiiqada iyo beenta ayaa ah caqabadda waqtigeenna.

english: Chapati or “chapo” as we fondly refer to them in Kenya, is a very popular flat bread that is a staple in many homes in East Africa.
somali: Chapati ama "chapo" sida aan ugu yeerno Kenya, waa rooti fidsan oo aad loo jecel yahay oo ah cunto aasaasi ah guryaha badan ee Bariga Afrika.

english: However,the Government through the Ministry of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Childhood should make sure that it provides adequate classrooms for these pupils to learn effectively.
somali: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, Dowladdu iyada oo adeegsaneysa Wasaaradda Waxbarashada, Sayniska, Tababarka Xirfadaha iyo Horumarinta Carruurnimada Hore waa inay hubisaa inay bixiso fasallo ku filan si ardaydani wax ugu bartaan si wax ku ool ah.

english: In recent years, a growing number of indie rock bands have begun writing their songs in Darija, the dialect of Arabic used in everyday conversation in Morocco.
somali: Sanadihii ugu dambeeyay, tiro sii kordheysa oo kooxo muusikada indie rock ah ayaa bilaabay inay ku qoraan heesahooda Darija, oo ah lahjadda Carabiga ee looga hadlo wadahadalka maalinlaha ah ee Morocco.

english: A working class area in Tunisia is called Houma…And rap speaks about these districts inhabited by the poor class, which officials and famous personalities rarely talk about
somali: Deegaanka shaqaalaha ee Tunisia waxaa la yiraahdaa Houma… Rap-kuna wuxuu ka hadlaa degmooyinkan ay ku nool yihiin dadka saboolka ah, kuwaas oo ay mas'uuliyiinta iyo dadka caanka ah ay dhif uga hadlaan.

english: One of the attendees used to study industrial design, and showed us her blog, Selouk.me, where she writes about the use of design to change people's behaviour.
somali: Mid ka mid ah ka qaybgalayaasha ayaa hore u baran jirtay naqshadaynta warshadaha, waxayna na tustay baloogeeda, Selouk.me, halkaas oo ay ku qorto isticmaalka naqshadaynta si loo beddelo hab-dhaqanka dadka.

english: To keep its momentum, the group has given itself a new objective: mobilise young people and give them a voice in anticipation of the 2012 presidential election.
somali: Si ay u sii waddo dadaalkeeda, kooxdu waxay siisay hadaf cusub: abaabulka dhalinyarada iyo siinta cod iyagoo rajeynaya doorashada madaxweynaha ee 2012.

english: Supporters including Global Voices and large media freedom organizations like the Committee to Protect Journalists have pressed for the bloggers’ freedom for many months, to no avail.
somali: Taageerayaasha oo ay ku jiraan Global Voices iyo ururada waaweyn ee u dooda xorriyadda saxaafadda sida Guddiga Ilaalinta Suxufiyiinta ayaa ku cadaadinayay xorriyadda baloogyada muddo bilo ah, iyada oo aan wax natiijo ah laga gaarin.

english: On the other hand, we now have three candidates who have decided to campaign as if nothing has happened and as if this political crisis doesn’t exist.
somali: Dhinaca kale, waxaan hadda haysannaa saddex musharrax oo go'aansaday inay ololeeyaan sidii aysan waxba dhicin oo ay sidii aysan jirin xiisaddan siyaasadeed.

english: For example, I'm thinking of one in which half the face is normal and the other is the flesh that all human beings have under their skin.
somali: Tusaale ahaan, waxaan ka fikirayaa mid ka mid ah oo kala badh wejigu caadi yahay, kan kalena uu yahay hilibka ay dhammaan aadanuhu ku leeyihiin maqaarkooda hoostiisa.

english: John Henry Kwahulé  at Nouvelle Afrique magazine says that Côte d'Ivoire is probably the only country in the world where journalists are imprisoned for publishing truthful information.
somali: John Henry Kwahulé oo ka tirsan joornaalka Nouvelle Afrique ayaa sheegay in Ivory Coast ay u badan tahay inay tahay dalka kaliya ee adduunka oo suxufiyiinta lagu xiro daabacaadda macluumaad run ah.

english: For organizations, governments, and funders, engagement with communities is beneficial in that citizens will support, adopt, champion, and eventually share in the ownership and success of programs.
somali: Ururrada, dowladaha, iyo maalgeliyeyaasha, ka qayb qaadashada bulshooyinka waxay faa'iido u leedahay in muwaadiniintu ay taageeraan, qaataan, u doodaan, ugu dambayntiina ay la wadaagaan lahaanshaha iyo guusha barnaamijyada.

english: Data visualization and navigation tools are a key feature in more than half of the projects we documented, as are diverse forms of data collection from citizens.
somali: Qalabka muuqaalka xogta iyo hagitaanka ayaa ah astaamo muhiim ah in ka badan kala bar mashaariicda aanu diiwaangelinay, sidoo kale noocyo kala duwan oo xog ururin ah oo ka imanaya muwaadiniinta.

english: Most undersea cables, including the SAT-3 that currently connects West Africa to the rest of the world, are built by consortiums of private and public (national) companies.
somali: Fiilooyinka badankood ee badda hoosteeda mara, oo ay ku jiraan SAT-3 oo hadda isku xira Galbeedka Afrika iyo adduunka intiisa kale, waxaa dhista shirkado iskaashato ah oo ka kooban shirkado gaar loo leeyahay iyo kuwa dowladeed (qaran).

english: Nevertheless, the challenge today is to transform sports into an economic development factor in less developed countries so that it may benefit all citizens over the long-term.
somali: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, caqabadda maanta taagan ayaa ah in isboortiga loo baddalo qodob horumarineed oo dhaqaale oo ka jira waddamada soo koraya si ay uga faa'iideystaan dhammaan muwaadiniinta muddada dheer.

english: A comment on a post about the mHealth Alliance  points out that this technology still can't replace the experience of being treated by a real live health practitioner.
somali: Faallo ku saabsan qoraal ku saabsan Isbahaysiga mHealth ayaa tilmaamaya in tiknoolajiyadani aysan weli beddeli karin waayo-aragnimada lagu daweynayo xirfadle caafimaad oo dhab ah.

english: On January 18 Global Voices will launch the Technology for Transparency Network, a collaborative research mapping of internet projects that promote greater transparency, government accountability, and civic engagement.
somali: 18ka Janaayo, Global Voices waxay bilaabayso Shabakadda Teknoolojiyadda ee Daahfurnaanta, oo ah cilmi-baaris wadajir ah oo khariidaynaysa mashaariicda internetka ee kor u qaadaya daahfurnaanta, isla xisaabtanka dowladda, iyo ka qaybgalka muwaadiniinta.

english: These village internet kiosks were first installed for farmers to learn in local languages the latest information regarding national and international prices in soy, wheat, tobacco and shrimp.
somali: Goobaha internet-ka ee tuulada markii ugu horreysay waxaa loo sameeyay beeraleyda si ay ugu bartaan luqadaha maxalliga ah macluumaadka ugu dambeeyay ee ku saabsan qiimaha gudaha iyo dibadda ee soy, sarreen, tubaako iyo haley.

english: e Choupal was conceived to tackle the challenges posed by the unique features of Indian agriculture, characterized by fragmented farms, weak infrastructure and the involvement of numerous intermediaries…
somali: e Choupal waxaa loo qaabeeyey si wax looga qabto caqabadaha ka dhasha astaamaha gaarka ah ee beeraha Hindiya, kuwaas oo lagu garto beero kala qaybsan, kaabayaal liita iyo ku lug lahaanshaha dad badan oo dhexdhexaad ah…
